program.name: Lifeline
program.description:
Phone or internet discount. Lifeline can give your household a monthly discount on phone or internet service. You may not get a discount on both unless you have a bundled service.

You may get only one Lifeline benefit per household, and you may not get Lifeline from more than one company.

You may qualify if your income is below a certain level. You may also qualify if any member of your household gets SNAP, SSI, or Medicaid.

It may take 2 business days to 2 weeks to receive this benefit.
